title: DevOps Engineer
description: Managing cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines.

### JOB MISSION & DOMAIN:
As a DevOps Engineer at TechMahindra, the primary mission is to manage cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines. The day-to-day reality involves working with AWS, Docker, and CI/CD tools to ensure seamless and efficient software deployment. This role demands a strong understanding of cloud computing, containerization, and automation. The DevOps Engineer will be responsible for:

* Designing, implementing, and maintaining cloud infrastructure using AWS.
* Ensuring the efficient deployment and management of applications using Docker and CI/CD tools.
* Collaborating with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve infrastructure-related issues.
* Developing and implementing automation scripts to improve deployment efficiency.

The technical environment requires expertise in AWS, Docker, and CI/CD tools, with a strong focus on automation and cloud infrastructure management.
